price: 5. Y nosotros creíamos que ni los hombres ni (nosotros) los yinn mentirían contra Al-lah’”.
arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن تَقُولَ ٱلۡإِنسُ وَٱلۡجِنُّ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-annā ẓanannā an lan taqūla al-insu wal-jinu ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban
